name: Game Jam-Chan
description:
Get your Game Jam on!

This romantic visual novel is funny, sexy and surprisingly educational!

Join Anon on his journey through a sexy game jam, as he learns and teaches all the things anyone would want to know about game jams!

This game was made in 8 hours for ROCIA Game Jam II.

This game has some harsh language and sexual suggestiveness, but it's really about game jams! I swear!
